name: Halloween Jumper
description:
HALLOWEEN JUMPER First Person Platformer where if you jump alot you'll die

That game made for mini jam 92 by Neyzi(me)

In this game you need to jump, but carefully, cause if you jump alot you will die. And also if you fall on the saws, spikes, abyss you will die too. So be carefull!
I hope you'll enjoy :)

#minijam
